name: Wizard Typist
description:
Background

The wizard has upset the natural order by trying to revive an old friend from the land of the dead and the Grim Reaper has taken notice.

You have been tasked with restoring the preternatural border. Poltergeists, ghosts, ghouls, and all manner of creatures are sneaking through the barrier.

Send these creatures back to the land of the dead before Death decides to fix the issue directly with your soul.

Controls

Type your spell on the keyboard and hit Enter to cast. Mind your accuracy or your spell may fizzle.

Source Code
